data.description:
This small kit contains the instruments a character needs to perform surgery on a wounded character using the (A) medicine skill. Surgery is only required if the gamemaster deems the injury to require it (mangled appendage, internal bleeding, severe burns) and/or there is no access to a bacta tank. You must be trained in the (A) medicine skill to perform surgery using a surgery kit.

Type: Standard surgery kit

Skill: (A) medicine

Cost: 1,000

Availability: 2

Game Notes: Fully heals a patient on a successful (A) medicine roll (base difficulty is Easy, modified at gamemaster discretion). Difficulty may be modified based on the complexity and conditions of the surgery. Healing time is:

  • 4D hours for Wounded patients,
  • 1D days for Incapacitated and
  • 2D days for Mortally Wounded.

If the roll fails, patient’s injury worsens two levels.
